response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and potential for those who appreciate its qualities. I believe it could greatly enhance your life or business, offering unparalleled benefits that align with your goals and aspirations.

I am offering this product to you at a special price of $2,000,000. This represents an exceptional value considering its true worth and the opportunities it presents. I understand that the value of such a product may be subjective, but I am confident that you will see the potential in it just as I do.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am here to provide you with all the information you need to make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 2000000}
